items.title: HEG Rides the Decarbonization Wave | Steel Industry’s Game-Changer | Stock of the Day
items.description: Stock of the day: HEG is amongst the largest producers of graphite electrodes which is essential consumable for the steel manufacturing through EAF (Electric Arc Furnace) plants. Globally, new plants are preferred to be EAF as it is environment friendly.  HEG being the lowest cost producer is better placed to absorb the potential tariffs in the US and capitalize on the demand coming from new steel plants.

items.title: Chartist Talks: Hedged's Rahul Ghose sees another 500 points downside in Nifty, advises accumulating these 2 heavyweights
items.description: Rahul Ghose of Hedged expects the Nifty to be stronger than Bank Nifty once the rebound starts.

items.title: Stock market holiday today: BSE, NSE to remain shut for Mahashivratri
items.description: Trading on the NSE and the BSE will resume on February 27 (Thursday).
